userStories.title: Stripe webhook Lambda

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/stripe_webhook/handler.py - Full webhook handler with HMAC-SHA256 signature verification, handles checkout.session.completed (creates tenant+user), customer.subscription.updated (updates status/plan/resets usage), customer.subscription.deleted (marks cancelled). CloudFormation adds Lambda + API Gateway POST /stripe/webhook. 22 unit tests in tests/test_stripe_webhook.py.

userStories.title: Subscription verification middleware

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/shared/subscription_middleware.py - Extracts X-Nat-User-Id/X-Nat-Tenant-Id headers, looks up user→tenant→subscription in DynamoDB, returns 402 for inactive (cancelled/past_due/unpaid), 403 for exceeded query limit. Supports decorator pattern for Lambda handlers. 26 unit tests in tests/test_subscription_middleware.py.

userStories.title: NationBuilder OAuth callback Lambda

acceptanceCriteria: Lambda receives OAuth callback with authorization code
Lambda exchanges code for access_token and refresh_token

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/nb_oauth_callback/handler.py - Full OAuth callback handler that receives authorization code from NB redirect, exchanges for access/refresh tokens via NB OAuth token endpoint, stores tokens in Secrets Manager (nat/user/{user_id}/nb-tokens) with expiration, updates user record with nb_connected=true and nb_token_expires_at. Returns 302 redirect to success or error page. CloudFormation adds Lambda + /auth/nationbuilder/callback GET endpoint. 15 unit tests in tests/test_nb_oauth_callback.py.

userStories.title: Token refresh Lambda with EventBridge
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tokens refreshed proactively so that users don't experience auth failures.
acceptanceCriteria: Lambda scans Users table for tokens expiring in next 12 hours
Lambda refreshes each token using refresh_token
New tokens stored in Secrets Manager
Failed refresh sets nb_needs_reauth=true
EventBridge rule triggers Lambda every 12 hours
Unit tests pass
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Depends on US-005. NB refresh tokens are single-use.
userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/token_refresh/handler.py - Scans Users table for nb_connected=true with nb_token_expires_at within 12-hour window. Refreshes via NB OAuth token endpoint (grant_type=refresh_token), stores new tokens in Secrets Manager, updates user record with new expiry. Sets nb_needs_reauth=true on failure. CloudFormation adds Lambda + EventBridge rule (rate(12 hours)). 18 unit tests in tests/test_token_refresh.py.

userStories.title: Port Nat agent to Lambda
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the existing Nat agent code deployed as a Lambda function so that it can process user queries.
acceptanceCriteria: Existing src/nat/ code packaged for Lambda
Lambda handler receives query and user context

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/nat_agent/handler.py - Lambda handler receives query and user context (page_type, person_name, etc.), retrieves NB tokens from Secrets Manager (nat/user/{user_id}/nb-tokens), uses existing create_nat_options() to configure Claude SDK with all 66 NB tools, returns JSON with response and tool_calls. Verifies nb_connected and nb_needs_reauth before processing. CloudFormation adds Lambda (120s timeout, 512MB) + POST /agent/query endpoint. 23 unit tests in tests/test_nat_agent.py.

userStories.title: SSE streaming response handler
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see Nat's response stream in real-time so that I know it's working.
acceptanceCriteria: Lambda supports response streaming via Lambda URLs

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/nat_agent_streaming/handler.py - New streaming Lambda handler with Lambda URL for true SSE streaming. Uses RESPONSE_STREAM invoke mode. Emits SSE events: text (partial responses), tool_use (tool invocations), tool_result (results), error, and done (final complete response with all tool_calls). CloudFormation adds NatAgentStreamingFunction + NatAgentStreamingUrl (Lambda Function URL with CORS). 25 unit tests in tests/test_nat_agent_streaming.py.

userStories.title: Usage tracking and rate limiting

userStories.implementation: src/lambdas/shared/usage_tracking.py - New module with check_rate_limit() for 5-second cooldown, track_query_usage() for incrementing queries_this_month atomically, check_and_reset_billing_cycle() for usage reset. Rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After header. Both nat_agent and nat_agent_streaming handlers integrate rate checking before processing and usage tracking after success. TENANTS_TABLE env var added to Lambda functions. 20 unit tests in tests/test_usage_tracking.py.

userStories.title: Chrome extension scaffold
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Chrome extension project with Manifest V3, Vite, and Preact so that I can build the sidebar UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Extension directory with manifest.json (Manifest V3)

userStories.implementation: extension/ directory with Manifest V3 Chrome extension scaffold. Vite builds content.js (Preact sidebar UI), background.js (service worker), and copies manifest.json + content.css. TypeScript with strict mode and @types/chrome. Content script matches *.nationbuilder.com, injects sidebar container, renders Preact Sidebar component. Background service worker handles auth state via chrome.storage.local. CSS scoped with high z-index to avoid NB conflicts.

userStories.title: Background service worker
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a background service worker that manages auth state and API connections.
acceptanceCriteria: Service worker maintains auth token in chrome.storage
Service worker handles messages from content scripts
Service worker manages SSE connection to backend
Service worker broadcasts responses to active tabs
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Depends on US-010. Manifest V3 uses service workers, not background pages.
userStories.implementation: extension/src/background/index.ts - Full service worker with auth state management (AuthState type with token/userId/tenantId/nbConnected/nbNeedsReauth/subscriptionStatus) in chrome.storage.local. Message handling via chrome.runtime.onMessage for GET/SET/CLEAR_AUTH_STATE, SET_NB_CONNECTION, SET_SUBSCRIPTION_STATUS, SUBMIT_QUERY, CANCEL_QUERY, GET_STREAMING_STATE. SSE connection to Lambda streaming URL with proper event parsing (text/tool_use/tool_result/error/done). Broadcasts streaming events to all NationBuilder tabs via chrome.tabs.query/sendMessage. Keepalive alarm mechanism (chrome.alarms) to prevent MV3 service worker termination during streaming.

userStories.title: Confirmation dialogs

userStories.notes: Depends on US-013. Backend tool responses include confirmation_required flag.
userStories.implementation: Backend: Added SSE_EVENT_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED and DESTRUCTIVE_TOOLS set (delete_signup, delete_contact, delete_donation, delete_event, delete_event_rsvp, delete_path_journey, remove_from_list, update_signup, update_donation, update_event) in nat_agent_streaming/handler.py. When agent calls destructive tool, sends confirmation_required event with tool_id, tool_name, tool_input, and human-readable summary. Client re-submits with confirmed_tools list to proceed. Extension: ConfirmationDialog.tsx component with icon (delete/warning/info), title, summary, warning message, and Cancel/Proceed buttons. Chat.tsx handles STREAMING_CONFIRMATION_REQUIRED event, shows dialog, and calls CONFIRM_ACTION or REJECT_ACTION. Background worker handles confirmation flow and re-submits query with confirmed tools.
